item.title: Git Commands
item.description: I often find myself forgetting the basic commands for Git. I know it’s dumb but it’s just easy to keep all of them in one place for reference. Also, for anyone new to Git - these are all the commands you need to get started. git init # command to convert any folder to a git repo. It creates a .git folder inside and then git tracks the changes made in it.
